misc: Bags Miura irons and is rumoured to sleep with them.
biography: Miso, a formidable presence hailing from Hirsala Golf, is set to make his tenth appearance at the Hector Troph√©e in 2025. With a singular victory in the team event to his name, Miso's competitive spirit and unwavering dedication mark him as a serious contender whenever he participates.

Beyond his on-course achievements, Miso is known for his meticulous attention to detail and unwavering loyalty to his equipment. It is whispered among his peers that he not only bags Miura irons but also maintains such a close relationship with them that he sleeps with them, ensuring they are always in peak condition for the next round.

While the Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, Miso's consistent performance and strategic prowess make him a player to watch. His focus and determination are clear indicators of his ambition to further etch his name into the tournament's history. Golfing fans are eagerly awaiting his next showing!
